name: Dismaya
description:
Description: Dismaya is a 3D isometric perspective puzzle, mobile game based on the critically acclaimed, Monument Valley. 

Story follows a bard on the journey of self-discovery. 

This is a student group project that I developed when I was newly acquainted with using Unity Game Engine and programming in C#. 

Date:  January - April, 2016 

Duration: 3 months

Creds:

1. Seyvaq Singh (Design)

2. Tan Jim Son (Design)

3. Dushanth Daniel Ray (Design)

4. Gan Zin Jer (Art)

5. Me (Tech)
